org.mokai.action
Class ReplaceAction

java.lang.Object
  org.mokai.action.ReplaceAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action, ExposableConfiguration<ReplaceAction>
public class ReplaceAction
extends Object
implements Action, ExposableConfiguration<ReplaceAction>

An action that replaces strings on a field. It uses the method String.replaceAll so you can use regular expressions.

Author:
German Escobar
